author: Bartłomiej Fulanty
comment: Thanks for the app Eugene! Does exactly what is advertised - can easily set up an exact time alarm, no stupid 15 minute intervals... :) Could use a slight improvement - when you are in alarms list, it is very easy to accidentally delete set alarm by swiping left-to-right (a generic dismiss gesture). The app should either ask if it's ok to delete alarm by swipping or provide a way of undoing the deletion (by a timed widget for example, like the rest of the wear interface does).
title: Excellent workaround of Google's stupid design decisions

author: Gleb Sokolov
comment: Hi, I wanted to say that this app stopped working on my lg g watch after an 5.1.1 update. I didn't want to give you a bad rating because of this bug. I think it deserves 5 stars anyway. Please fix this bug. Spasibo ;)
title: One of the best apps!

author: Imre Velez
comment: I've installed and un installed twice and I still can't find the app on my LG g watch R,  it just doesn't appear on the app drawer.  has it happened to anyone? Sorry for the 2 stars,  will update the rating as soon  as problem fixed,  thx
title: Can't find the app on the watch

author: Gowri Shanker Bellu
comment: This app was so useful. However After upgrading to 5.1.1 the app simply crashes. I'm wondering why did I upgrade to 5.1.1. Please fix.
title: Crashes in 5.1.1

author: Jason John Smith
comment: I fire up the app on my Note 3 and get a black screen with a circle containing a plus sign. I press that and the app crashes. Complete waste of time.
title: Failed

author: Ted Miller
comment: Vibration is ignoring sleep or wake. Uninstalling to see if that stops it. Using LG g watch with LG g5 phone, Android Wear 5.0
title: Can't turn off

author: dilemmalee bruno
comment: Is getting a bad review because it won't work on my LG G watch running 5.1.1 and my nexus 6 running 5.1
title: Unfortunately AlarmClock Extended...

author: Michael Sirounian
comment: I was expecting a one time alarm for the settings but this app is great if you want to set an alarm that repeats at the same time.
title: Great for planned future alarms

comment: Great app,  finally I am waking up without any ugly sounds, just vibration around wrist.  ☺
title: Cool

comment: Doesn't work. Crashes on launch every time.
title: Crashes on launch

author: Eduardo Castaneda
comment: Could not get it to work.
title: Crash

author: Chad Dionne
comment: This app would be much better if the alarm could be set from your phone.
title: Small Improvement

comment: cant use it. it crashes when i create an alarm in android wear. using lg urbane

author: Gaurav Raj Chattarki
comment: It's okay

author: Shabier Yousaf
comment: Works a treat and does what it is meant to.
title: Simplicity

author: David Chong
comment: Crashes

author: Adam Lockwood
comment: This app is sooo useful and the new ui looks so much better on my LG G Watch R,  only thing is that since the update even if I dismiss the alarm it will go off around every 45 to 60 minutes even after I dismiss it.  Plus the interval is random(between 45  & 60) But still,  I love this app!
title: Love this!

author: Nani Sanchez
comment: finally, a one time alarm! i thank you from the bottom of my heart. now, if you could just tweak the layout so it fits on the 360, you would be my hero...
title: Joining the 360 chorus

author: Jason Peel
comment: Love the app,  functions very well and intuitively, except when my alarms go off on my moto 360 I cannot see which button is snooze and which is dismiss.
title: Great app,  please add graphics for Moto 360

author: Kelvin Foo
comment: Would be great if we could edit alarms via phone or watch and also set alarm for day of week and time by voice
title: Great but could be better

author: Karl Scharler
comment: kein Vergleich mit der Standard Alarm Clock. Ist so, wie sie sein soll. Kann jeden einzelnen Tag eingegeben, kann das ganze auf Minute genau. Wie gesagt, wie es eben sein soll.
title: Super

author: Andy Feely
comment: As soon as I set an alarm for the morning, it kept going off, no matter how many times I pressed silence or snooze it just kept going and going and wouldn't stop.. other than that it looked to be a great alarm app for wear devices , I hope that this can be fixed!
title: Uninstalled because

author: LJ Spencer
comment: I don't know why but i accidentally deleted my first comment. I tried what you said to do and it still kept going off every second.

reply.author: JokerXT
reply.content: what time you set? and what settings?

title: Please fix in moto 360

comment: Crashes on start using Sony SW3 with Android wear 5.1.1.  I hope this is fixed because I like the idea of an alarm that works on theater mode!
